channel.description: here it is dagger-long. item.title: The last monarchy
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:9, topic:266505”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=351968.msg2700492#msg2700492 date=1236559499]
Very nice, which program did you make with?
If metasequoia, may i see the wireframe, just out of interest ^.^

I started using 3ds max, tbh, i suck ass lol.
[/quote]
nice, how is 3DS max? i use blender, and i LOVE it. lol. although, blender is a program where ill never know all the tools cuz theirs (WAY) too many =P[/quote]

Not too good tbh, i made a house, designed my own blueprints, did all the walls, very nice, used booleans to make the door and window spots, but when i got to roof.
Well.
I failed.

Then i made a swimming pool, but for some reason, i can’t get subdividing to work to give me the water wavy texture/colours.

[quote=“0bbyme, post:11, topic:266505”]i used meta seq ill show the wire frame for the long 1 sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 08:11:10 pm[/size][hr]
i made the hilt a little smaller and the emblem thingy a bit bigger[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 08:58:29 pm[/size][hr]got board so added some texture to it[/quote]

Ah cool, i was just wondering how you got some of the parts of the hilt so rounded.
Looks kinda high poly.

Read full topic
